metadata.name: Meterpreter or Cobalt Strike Getsystem Service Installation - System
metadata.comment: Detects the use of getsystem Meterpreter/Cobalt Strike command by detecting a specific service installation

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.log_provider) = lower('service control manager') AND metadata.event_code = 7045 AND (contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('/c')) AND contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('echo')) AND contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('\\\\pipe\\\\')) AND (contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('%comspec%'))) OR contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('rundll32')) AND contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('.dll,a')) AND contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('/p:')) OR startswith(lower(process.file.path), lower('\\\\127.0.0.1\\\\admin$\\\\'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of getsystem Meterpreter/Cobalt Strike command by detecting a specific service installation
